this_title: The Brilliant Biograph: Earliest Moving Images of Europe (1897-1902)
trans_title: 奇妙的比沃格拉夫电影公司：欧洲最早的活动影像(1897-1902)
introduction: Eye Filmmuseum and the British Film Institute present a compilation film of newly-restored rare images from the first years of filmmaking. Immerse yourself in enchanting images of Venice, Berlin, Amsterdam and London from 120 years ago. Let yourself be carried away in the mesmerizing events and celebrities of the time, and feel the enthusiasm of early cinema that overcame the challenge of capturing life-like movement.
chinese_title: 奇妙的比沃格拉夫电影公司：欧洲最早的活动影像(1897-1902)
foreign_title: The Brilliant Biograph: Earliest Moving Images of Europe (1897-1902)
